author: Sponsored
title: PC gaming can keep you busy at home during the coronavirus outbreak
description: Sharpen your skills and pass the time by exploring the world of PC gaming with Omen 15.
content:
Staying at home during the current coronavirus outbreak is going to be a bit of a challenge. Were social creatures by nature and thus staying in contact with friends is baked into our DNA. 
So, what do you do when all that stops, and youre meant to stay at h… [+2398 chars]
